reviewtext: After close to 20 years I broke down and got my second pair of my MDR's  my first two MDR-600 witch I have are the best headsets you can buy.  The MDR-V6 is the same just a bit smaller and lighter  for the price I am absolutely blown away $40 they should be well over $100 and I paid more than that two decades ago for my old set.  You cant go wrong.
